Privacy Policy 2: URL Album ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle user data in our app.
Details 1-1: We do not collect, store, or share any personally identifiable information (PII) from users.
Details 2-1: Our app uses third-party services, which may collect usage data for analytics and advertising purposes:
Details 2-2: Firebase Analytics – Used to understand app usage trends.
Details 2-3: Firebase Crashlytics – Used to detect and diagnose app crashes.
Details 2-4: Google AdMob – Used to display advertisements.
Details 2-5: These services may collect anonymized data as per their privacy policies. We do not have direct access to or control over this data.
Details 3-1: The limited, non-personally identifiable data collected by third-party services is used to:
Details 4-1: We do not store user data on our servers. Data collected by third-party services is managed by their respective privacy policies.
Details 4-2: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted within the App and updated on this page with a revised effective date. By using URL Album, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
